name: 幽谷战域 Mystic Valley Battleground
name_original: 幽谷战域 Mystic Valley Battleground
description:
Valley Battlefield is a casual adventure game where players need to click on a map block and encounter various monsters or events to obtain equipment, skills, and treasures, improve their attributes, and defeat the final boss to win!

Unique combat style

The unique combat style in the game allows players to make deeper strategic choices when attacking enemies. Players can attack by clicking, and after the attack, the enemy will counterattack based on their skills. This design increases the interactivity and tactical nature of battles, requiring players to weigh the timing and methods of attacking different enemies.

Diverse equipment systems

In this game, the equipment system is an extremely rich and diverse core feature. Players collect various equipment in the game, including weapons, armor, accessories, etc., which have different qualities and random attributes. Players can also integrate the effects of additional equipment sets on their own.

Unique Skills

In the game, players can freely combine different skills to create diverse combat strategies. Each skill has unique characteristics and effects, and when multiple skills are combined, the resulting effects will exceed the capabilities of a single skill.

Rich treasure system

Treasures can complement players' growth paths. They can accelerate players' upgrade speed, enhance the effectiveness of specific skills, increase attributes, gain economy, and so on, so as to intelligently match according to the player's character development direction, and lay the groundwork for obtaining various treasures to fight against the boss.
